items.sentence: Tom never thought he\'d be able to do what he just did.
Mary said that she loved me, but I didn\'t believe her.
Tom doesn\'t have a pet now, but he used to have a dog.
Tom doesn\'t know how Mary will get to school tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t know how to write a love letter in French.
Tom saw what was happening and he didn\'t say anything.
Tom says he doesn\'t remember what happened that night.
Tom wanted Mary dead because she had murdered his kids.
Tom wanted to prove to his friends that he could do it.
Tom was a little surprised by how well Mary could swim.
